name: Strategic Accounting Solutions Dev
short_description:
This is a package that will include a Strategy Development Tool that will be linked to the Budget and through the budget to the monthly financials. As a Financial Manager, I found this lacking, including proper review tools at Month End. 

Hopefully this package will address all the issues and make Strategies, Budgets and putting it all together as well as Month end Reviews much less stress-l and painfull.
summary: Development of an Accounting Package that includes the Strategy
